snippet: The project will make some 1.5 million digitized pages freely available online from the two institutions' collections of Greek manuscripts, 15th-century incunabula, Hebrew manuscripts and early printed books.
abstract: The project will make some 1.5 million digitized pages freely available online from the two institutions' collections of Greek manuscripts, 15th-century incunabula, Hebrew manuscripts and early printed books.

headline.main: Vatican and Bodleian Libraries to Digitize Ancient Texts
headline.print_headline: Vatican Library’s Texts To Be Digitized
